name: Mr.Reuel Adventure in England
description:
Mr.Reuel Adventure in England is a platform exploration game where you must search in each stage (which can be chosen in the order that the player wants) the 10 pages of Mr.Reuel's family tree which is a typical Englishman. There are several hidden things to find and more than 40 pieces to look for in 4 (and other secret) big stages.
Please let us know in the comments if you liked the game, how far you got to it and if there are problems like bugs or other things.
